body_html:
I meet the same problem with GeForce GTX 1080, I build from source and configure compute capability to 6.1. I run a modified version of cifar10, after 9990 step(I set max_step = 10000), program failed. I always failed at final step.

2016-08-11 17:26:23.054839: step 9980, loss = 5.73 (55.6 examples/sec; 2.302 sec/batch)
2016-08-11 17:26:47.250385: step 9990, loss = 5.70 (52.9 examples/sec; 2.420 sec/batch)
E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_DEINITIALIZED
F tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_event_mgr.cc:198] Unexpected Event status: 1
Aborted (core dumped)

body:
I meet the same problem with GeForce GTX 1080, I build from source and configure compute capability to 6.1. I run a modified version of cifar10, after 9990 step(I set max_step = 10000), program failed. I always failed at final step.

```
2016-08-11 17:26:23.054839: step 9980, loss = 5.73 (55.6 examples/sec; 2.302 sec/batch)
2016-08-11 17:26:47.250385: step 9990, loss = 5.70 (52.9 examples/sec; 2.420 sec/batch)
E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_DEINITIALIZED
F tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_event_mgr.cc:198] Unexpected Event status: 1
Aborted (core dumped)
```
